titles.title: When the Saints Go Marching In

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
When the saints go marching in
When the saints go marching in;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lord I want to be in that number
When the saints go marching in;

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’m a pilgrim and a stranger
Wand’ring thro’ this world of sin,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
On my way to that fair city,
When the Saints go marching in.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Oh, I know I’ll see my Savior
If my life is free from sin,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Heaven's doors will open for me
When the Saints go marching in.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When we gather
‘round the Throne
And the gates are closed within,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
I’ll be shouting “Glory, Glory”
When the Saints go marching in.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I’m waiting for the chariot
To swing low and I’ll step in.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
On the clouds I’ll ride to Heaven
When the Saints go marching in.
